<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update Access Key Status</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"patch"} path={"/access_keys/{id}/status/{status}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Activates or deactivates the access key that has the specified ID. You cannot activate an expired access key.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"Access key ID","in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"Whether or not the access key is active. True means active.","in":"path","name":"status","required":true,"schema":{"type":"boolean"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

successful operation

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"400"} value={"400"}><div>

empty_access_key_status_provided

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"403"} value={"403"}><div>

unauthorized_to_use_access_keys

</div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
